permissionDenied.title: Permissions denied!
permissionDenied.text: The user [I][USER][/I] has no permission to view this map!

hostNotConfigured.title: Host not found!
hostNotConfigured.text: Can not find the Host [HOSTNAME] in the configuration from Nagios!

serviceNotConfigured.title: Service not found!
serviceNotConfigured.text: Can not find the Host [SERVICENAME] in the configuration from Nagios!

servicegroupNotFround.title: Servicegruop not found!
servicegroupNotFround.text: Can not Servicegroup [HOSTGROUPNAME] wurde nicht gefunden!

serviceNoState.title: No state for Service!
serviceNoState.text: Can not determine state from host [HOSTNAME] with the service [SERVICENAME]!

noUser.title: No User
noUser.text: No user name was handed over at NagVis! Please check your .htaccess configuration!

mapCfgNotReadable.title: Can not read Map Config File
mapCfgNotReadable.text: Please check the webservers permissions at the CFG-File ([I][MAP][/I])

mapCfgNotWriteable.title: Can not write Map Config File
mapCfgNotWriteable.text: Please check the permissions of the webserver user at the CFG-File ([I][MAP][/I])

mainCfgNotExists.title: NagVis Config File doesn't exists
mainCfgNotExists.text: The Main Config FIle ([I][MAINCFG][/I]) doesn't exists

mainCfgNotReadable.title: Can not read NagVis Config File
mainCfgNotReadable.text: Please check the webservers permissions at the MainCfg-file ([I][MAINCFG][/I])

mainCfgNotWriteable.title: Can not write NagVis Config File
mainCfgNotWriteable.text: Please check the webservers permissions at the MainCfg-file ([I][MAINCFG][/I])

backgroundNotReadable.title: Can not read Map Image File
backgroundNotReadable.text: Please check the webservers permissions at the PNG-File ([I][IMGPATH][/I])

backgroundNotWriteable.title: Can not write Map Image File
backgroundNotWriteable.text: Please check the webservers permissions at the PNG-File ([I][IMGPATH][/I])

mustValueNotSet.title: Must value not set
mustValueNotSet.text: A must value ([I][ATTRIBUTE][/I]) is not set in an object of type [I][TYPE][/I] in map [I][MAPNAME][/I]

unknownObject.title: Unknown type defined in Map Config File
unknownObject.text: The Type [I][TYPE][/I] in map [I][MAPNAME][/I] is not allowed!

unknownAttribute.title: Unknown attribute defined in Map Config File
unknownAttribute.text: The Attribute [I][ATTRIBUTE][/I] is not allowed in Elements of type [I][TYPE][/I] in map [I][MAPNAME][/I]

languageNotReadable.title: Can not read Language-File
languageNotReadable.text: Please check the webserver permission at the Language-File ([I][LANGFILE][/I])!

mapCfgDirNotReadable.title: Can not read Map Config Folder
mapCfgDirNotReadable.text: Please check the permissions of the webserver user at the Folder ([I][MAPPATH][/I])!

mapCfgDirNotWriteable.title: Can not write Map Config Folder
mapCfgDirNotWriteable.text: Please check the permissions of the webserver user at the Folder ([I][MAPPATH][/I])

headerConfigNotReadable.title: Can not read Head Config file
headerConfigNotReadable.text: Please check the permissions of the webserver user at the Headerconfig-file ([I][CFGPATH][/I])!

loopInMapRecursion.title: Loop in Map recursion
loopInMapRecursion.text: The linked maps are producing a loop. Please fix this loop!

iconNotExists.title: Icon not exists
iconNotExists.text: An icon ([i][IMGPATH][/i]) which is used on the map doesn't exists.

couldNotDeleteMapCfg.title: Unable to delete map config
couldNotDeleteMapCfg.text: Could not delete the map config file ([i][MAPPATH][/i]).

couldNotDeleteMapImage.title: Unable to delete map image
couldNotDeleteMapImage.text: Could not delete the map image file ([i][IMGPATH][/i]).

configModeNotSupported.title: No support
configModeNotSupported.text: The configurations mode was not supported for your Browser!

couldNotGetHoverUrl.title: Could not get hover URL
couldNotGetHoverUrl.text: Could not get hover URL ([i][URL][/i]). Maybe the URL is password protected.

onlyPngOrJpgImages.title: NagVis-GD: Only PNG or JPG images allowed
onlyPngOrJpgImages.text: NagVis-GD: Only PNG or JPG Map-Image extensions are allowed.

maybePhpMemoryLimitToLow.title: NagVis-GD: Maybe PHP memory_limit to low
maybePhpMemoryLimitToLow.text: NagVis-GD: Maybe the memory_limit of PHP is to low for displaying this image.

backendNotExists.title: Backend doesn't exists!
backendNotExists.text: The backend with ID [i][BACKENDID][/i] of type [i][BACKENDTYPE][/i] doesn't exists.

noBackendDefined.title: Found no defined backends!
noBackendDefined.text: No backend could be found in NagVis configuration.

backendNotInitialized.title: Backend not initialized!
backendNotInitialized.text: The backend with the ID [i][BACKENDID][/i] of type [i][BACKENDTYPE][/i] is not initialized. Check your main configuration file.

mysqlNotSupported.title: NDOMy Backend error! (Backend [BACKENDID])
mysqlNotSupported.text: Your PHP installation lacks SQL support. You can't use the NDOMy Backend without php-mysql!

errorSelectingDb.title: NDOMy Backend error! (Backend [BACKENDID])
errorSelectingDb.text: Error selecting Database. Maybe wrong dbName or insufficient permissions?

nagiosNotRunning.title: NDOMy Backend error! (Backend [BACKENDID])
nagiosNotRunning.text: Caution: NDO reports that Nagios is NOT running!

nagiosDataNotUpToDate.title: NDOMy Backend error! (Backend [BACKENDID])
nagiosDataNotUpToDate.text: NDOMy Backend Error~Caution: NDO claims that Nagios did NO status Update for more than [I][TIMEWITHOUTUPDATE][/I] seconds! Make sure that Nagios and ndo2db are running!

hostNotFoundInDB.title: Host not found in database! (Backend [BACKENDID])
hostNotFoundInDB.text: The Host [b][HOST][/b] was not found in the Database. Maybe it is spelled wrong?

hostGroupNotFoundInDB.title: Hostgroup not found in database! (Backend [BACKENDID])
hostGroupNotFoundInDB.text: The Hostgroup [b][HOSTGROUP][/b] was not found in the Database. Maybe it is spelled wrong?

serviceNotFoundInDB.title: Service not found in database! (Backend [BACKENDID])
serviceNotFoundInDB.text: The Service [b][SERVICE][/b] on host [b][HOST][/b] was not found in the Database. Maybe it is spelled wrong?

serviceGroupNotFoundInDB.title: Servicegroup not found in database! (Backend [BACKENDID])
serviceGroupNotFoundInDB.text: The Servicegroup [b][SERVICEGROUP][/b] was not found in the Database. Maybe it is spelled wrong?

hostIsPending.title: Host is in pending state! (Backend [BACKENDID])
hostIsPending.text: The Host [b][HOST][/b] is in pending state.

serviceNotChecked.title: Service not checked yet! (Backend [BACKENDID])
serviceNotChecked.text: The Service [b][SERVICE][/b] has not been checked yet.

noTablesExists.title: No matching tables in Database (Backend [BACKENDID])
noTablesExists.text: There are no tables in database matching given prefix "[i][PREFIX][/i]".

statusCgiNotFound.title: StatusCgi not found! ([BACKENDID])
statusCgiNotFound.text: Check the path of the [STATUSCGI]-Var in the nagvis-configuration!

mustValueNotSet.text: A necessary value is not set. All red marked values are obligation values.

onlyLineOrIcon.text: A Object can be only a Icon or a line, iconset and line_type can be used not together.

not2coords.text: It seems, you wants a line to define (line_type is set), but it is no 2 [COORD] coordinates indicated.

only1or2coords.text: Only possible in or 2 coordinates [COORD] are to be indicated.

lineTypeNotSelected.text: You indicated two [COORD] coordinates, therefore also line_type must be selected.

clickMapToSetPoints.text: Click on the map around the missing points to determine.

confirmDelete.text: Do you really want to delete this object?

mustChoosePngImage.text: You must select an image with the extension .png.

chooseMapName.text: You must indicate a name for the new map.

minOneUserAccess.text: At least one user must have access to the map.

mustChooseDefaultIconset.text: You must select default_iconset for this map.

mustChooseBackgroundImage.text: You must select the background image for this map.

mapAlreadyExists.text: This map exists already. Select another name.

foundNoBackgroundToDelete.text: No background image found. Operation terminated.

confirmNewMap.text: Do you really want to provide a new map?

confirmMapRename.text: Do you really want to rename this map?

confirmMapDeletion.text: Do you really want to delete this map? This action cannot be cancelled!

confirmBackgroundDeletion.text: Do you really want to delete this background image? This action cannot be cancelled!

unableToDeleteBackground.text: Cannot delete [IMAGE NAME], because the map [MAP] was in use

noPermissions.text: You don not have the permissions to change this map.

minOneUserWriteAccess.text: At least one user must have the authorization, in order to change this map.

unableToWorkWithMap.text: The map cannot be processed no more. Procedure was broken off.

confirmRestore.text: Surely that you want to re-establish the Backup?

backend.text: Select a backend. Available are the Backends NDOMY (fast and stable, from an existing Nagios NDO MySQL data base draws the data) and HTML (slow and rather unreliable, parsed the Nagios CGIs).

maps.text: Rotate maps example: server, lan, wan

headercount.text: Number of on the links of per line in the header-menu.

autoupdatefreq.text: WUI puts on with to work on regularly a Backup of the file and/or stores automatically. That interval can be adjusted here.

checkconfig.text: If set to 'Yes', forces a check of the current configuration. MUST be done after any change.

usegdlibs.text: GDLib benutzen? GD wird nur zum zeichnen von "Line" typen benötigt, wenn Probleme mit GD auftreten, kann GD hier mit "0" deaktiviert werden, alle anderen Typen funktionieren auch ohne GD. Linien stehen dann aber nicht mehr zur Verfügung.

base.text: Full local path to the NagVis basis directory.

cfg.text: Local path to the NagVis etc. directory.

icon.text: Local path to the NagVis iconsets directory.

map.text: Local path to the backgroung images(*.png).

mapcfg.text: Local path to the Map-Config files (*.cfg)

htmlcgi.text: HTTP path to the Nagios CGIs (/nagios/cgi-bin).

htmlicon.text: HTTP path to the NagVis iconsets directory.

htmlmap.text: HTTP path to the NagVis Maps (/nagios/nagvis/maps/).

htmldoku.text: HTTP path to the NagVis Docu.

index.text: Include file for th edefault site.

dbhost.text: NDO Backend: Hostname of the NDO Database (example: localhost).

dbport.text: NDO Backend: Port of the NDO Database (default 3306).

dbname.text: NDO Backend: Name of the NDO Database.

dbuser.text: NDO Backend: User for the NDO database access. the user needs only READ (SELECT) permissions!.

dbpass.text: NDO Backend: Passwort des Users für den Datenbankzugriff.

dbprefix.text: NDO Backend: Kürzel vor den Tabellennamen in der NDO DB (z.B. ndo_)

dbinstancename.text: NDO Backend: Instance name of the NDO installation (only with several NDO installations, normally default is set)

maxtimewithoutupdate.text: NDO Backend: Maximum time without updates in the NDO database

cgiuser.text: HTML Backend: The user with the NagVis the CGIs calls (allowed for all services, allowed for all host should be)

cgipath.text: HTML Backend: Full local path to the Nagios CGIs (/usr/local/nagios/sbin).

title.text: Title of the NagVis sides in the Browser.
